payload.title: EventBus Coherence Documentation - Complete Blueprint Sync
payload.description: Create comprehensive coherence documentation for EventBus Module including capability tables, EARS traceability matrix, implementation status verification, and cross-reference validation with all related blueprints and implementation files.
payload.notes: Comprehensive coherence documentation created following crypto_module.md and factory_module.md patterns. Includes capability tables for 8 EventBus methods across 6 event domains, EARS traceability matrix for 32 tests, event type support verification, integration points documentation, and gap analysis for future adapter integration.
